name: eyeryhthm
description: Privacy-focused real-time eye movement tracking application

scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:unit -- --run
scripts.electron:start: wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.electron:build: npm run verify && ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run verify && ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && electron-builder --mac --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run verify && ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run verify && ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && electron-builder --linux --config electron-builder.config.js
